name: Toby8204
text: I have ordered here several times and had issues. Not sure why my order is always wrong. The product is usually good though. The last time I had an issue with my wing order. The manager corrected it in a timely manner and was nice about it.

name: Sean Mann
text: Very fast very friendly  nice staff. I got it to go so I don't know what the dining room looked like

name: Dahlia Guerrero
text: My son enjoyed redeeming his Book-it! He earned from school!!

name: Susan Dixon
text: Awful experience the order was processed incorrectly and the manager told the driver he didn't have time because he was short of help and busy and the manager hung up....mn

name: EB J
text: Real good pizza

name: Just Jen
text:
I ordered a pizza , wings , breadsticks , and chicken Alfredo .
NOTHING WAS GOOD !
It may have been from the 1HOUR wait for my food to get here or the fact that …More

name: Jeannia Novak
text: I waited over 2 hours for my food to get delivered. When I called they said was almost ready. A hour later I called back and they said it hasnt been started they ran out of pizza dough. Well I also looked at my back account and they stole …More

name: Martha Burton
text: Horrible customer service and was told by the girl on the phone I should not call back and order cause of her mistakes. When i asked to talk to the manager I was placed on hold and no one ever got back on. Went to the store and asked to speak to the manager where I was again ignored. Will never order here again.

name: Tammy Cauley
text: Exactly how ordered and on time!

name: Lit Pretty
text: The food there is nasty . They use oversized chicken wing full of harmons . Everything taste like cardboard.  I hate this Pizza Hut in vidalia they really need to do better !

name: Jerry D
text: Fast service especially for a Saturday. Food was very good and reasonably priced. The person that took the order was very patient and nice. The delivery person was professional and nice very happy with the entire experience.

name: Patricia Atwell
text: Ordered delivery and it took 45 min it went out for delivery to get it even though I was only about 3 miles from the store. The pizza was barely luke warm when it arrived.

name: Noah Varn
text: Completely awful. I have been waiting forever and it says my food is ready . They have messed up everyone’s order that has came in

name: Ansley Phillips
text: An hour and thirty minutes after ordering, the delivery driver still hasn’t shown. Called the store. They have ONE delivery driver for a Saturday night. I get it’s prom weekend, but PLAN ahead. The owner/GM should have assigned an additional driver on the weekend, had another manager cover it, or cover it themselves.

name: carlo saleh
text: Good pizza good price

name: Ward Country
text: Very  disappointed in this place! Our pizza has been ready for the past hour and nothing has been said! Also while other have been in and out after us was leaving before us and we never got the drinks we paid for because the neglected to prepare themselves for a big event?! One star is giving them too much credit

name: Samantha Stanley
text: We had pizza delivered to our house. They left off the marinara for the garlic knots, the pizza was way over cooked, and it did not include the garlic buttery crust as requested. It was also very late. We called, and the manager told us she …More

name: Jeremy Turner
text: It took 2 hours for the pizza to be delivered and it was cold. They also forgot my breadsticks and I will not order again.

name: Jo Lee
text: Their best thing going is "carry out". We never eat in.

name: Michele Brown
text: Always good pizza. A little slow to come to counter to give me my pizza

name: Olanda Williams
text: The girls took great care of me... Thank You

name: Pamela Morgan Lawson Cribb
text: The pizza was greasy and nasty. The workers were nice. But we threw the pizza in the garbage.

name: Daniel Slavy
text: This Pizza Hut has a small dine in area with about three two person tables. The staff was courteous and laid back. The food was cooked quickly and tasted great. Overall a pleasant experience.

name: Juicy Fruit
text: The pizza was great this time. Great Job guys

name: Katie Pope
text: Ordered a pizza for delivery at 6 PM. Pizza was still not delivered by 9 PM. When I called the store to ask about my order at 8, all they could tell me was that it was out for delivery. If you’re going to order from them, you better go pick it up.

name: Lynn C Jackson
text: It's okay. Much better than Dominos. Biggest complaint was even though i had ordered early (I ordered at 5 to pick up at 6). I still had to wait on my order. Other than that the food was good and the family enjoyed it.

name: April Gillis
text: I love pizza hut but was very disappointed yesterday. My crust was falling apart and it was burned and badly put together. (Update) for After 4 months, I tried again. Safe to say I will NEVER go back.

name: Brenda Martin
text: Just received our order. The pizza has no sauce on it!

name: Lisa Dees
text: Customer Service was not adequate or professional. Employees were not working well together or structured. Orders were not as ordered over telephone. Inadequate results and inadequacy with order.

name: Wendy Brown
text: Customer service over the phone was less than polite and courteous. Like we were bothering them by placing a delivery order and operator didn't even know prices of what we ordered. Unsatisfactory!!!

name: Wayne Lady
text: I know they make pizza s to order. But mine tasted like it been setting under a heat lamp for a couple hours. We order in the daytime with  no problems.  But when I order at night it's hit and miss

name: Tammy Day
text: We ordered online and was ready to go not too long after ordering also they helped me carry it out to my SUV. We ordered a lot hahaha but still I never asked for help they just did.

text: Bad customer service, I can't believe the attitude and no patients.
